alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 25 at 9:40PM EDT until October 26 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Western Monmouth, Eastern Monmouth, Ocean, Cumberland, Atlantic, Cape May, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic, Coastal Ocean and Southeastern Burlington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on a slower commute. Leave early and be watch out for slower drivers. Drive less than the speed limit when visibility is reduced. Use low-beam setting in the fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
